thread.title: LEGAL NOTICE NOTICE IS HEREBY GIVEN THAT the Tuolumne
thread.title_full: LEGAL NOTICE NOTICE IS HEREBY GIVEN THAT the Tuolumne

title: LEGAL NOTICE NOTICE IS HEREBY GIVEN THAT the Tuolumne
text:
LEGAL NOTICE NOTICE IS HEREBY GIVEN THAT the Tuolumne ad date: 10/09/2015 
NOTICE IS HEREBY GIVEN THAT the Tuolumne County Planning Commission of Tuolumne County, California, will conduct a public hearing on Wednesday, October 21, 2015, at 6:00 p.m., in the Board of Supervisors Chambers, 2 South Green Street, Sonora to consider the following: 1. JONES, 1) Conditional Use Permit (CUP15-006) for 80 foot tall monopole tower with antennas on a 5.0 acre parcel zoned M-1; 2) Variance (VAR15-002) to allow the tower 120 feet from the adjacent parcel. 14971 Camage Avenue. APN 61-150-08. Information on the above proposals is available in the Community Resources Agency Monday through Friday, 8:00 a.m. to 3:00 p.m., Fourth Floor, A. N. Francisco Building, 48 West Yaney, Sonora, California, and online at Interested persons are invited to be heard. Court challenges to any decision on the above proposals may be limited to issues raised at the public hearing described herein or in correspondence submitted at, or prior to, said hearing. s/Bev Shane, AICP Publication Date: October 9, 2015 The Union Democrat, Sonora, CA 95370
